author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to our in-depth summary of Rhythm of War, the fourth epic installment in Brandon Sanderson's Stormlight Archive! Thank you Squarespace for sponsoring today's video: https://www.squarespace.com/danielgreene 
This video dives into the major plot points, character arcs, and key themes of the novel, offering a detailed look at the incredible world of Roshar. Whether you’re preparing for a reread, catching up before the next release, or looking for an in-depth breakdown of this fantasy masterpiece, you’ve come to the right place.
Second channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC-EqiFg67s2Nd0imgRXg5w
